data.eml:eml: New Nipponentomon species from northern Asia (Protura: Acerentomata, Nipponentomidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Bu, Yun, Wu, Dong Hui, Shrubovych, Julia, Yin, Wen Ying (2013): New Nipponentomon species from northern Asia (Protura: Acerentomata, Nipponentomidae). Zootaxa 3636 (4): 525-546, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3636.4.2
